tagline: Connecting creativity and technology to transform ideas into efficient and relevant digital solutions
aboutIntro: I am a student of Internet Systems Technology at IFSul - Campus Charqueadas, focusing on web development and creating modern and efficient digital solutions. Throughout my journey, I have been working with various technologies and accumulating valuable experiences in real projects.
frontendSkills: Front-end: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, Next.js, Tailwind
otherSkills: I also have knowledge in languages and tools such as Java, C, Python, and TypeScript, which provides me with a solid foundation to work in different contexts and technical challenges.
professionalProfile: As a professional, I am organized, communicative, and collaborative. I have intermediate English skills and am familiar with agile methodologies, information security, artificial intelligence, and Open Finance. Committed to delivering quality results, I am always seeking continuous improvement and constant learning.
timelineDescription: A brief summary of my journey as a developer
timeline2023Description: Completion of the IT technical course, where I had my first contact with programming languages and participated in school projects that allowed me to apply the knowledge acquired in class in practice.
timeline2024Description: I participated in the structuring of DEPS Models, an initiative that provided me with real experience with clients and actual projects. I acted in all stages of development, using agile methodologies, participating in meetings with stakeholders, and contributing to both the front-end and back-end of applications.
timeline2025Description: I was selected for the Compass UOL Open Finance Scholarship, where I deepened my knowledge in development with a focus on JavaScript and Node.js. This experience has been essential for my professional growth in a dynamic environment focused on financial innovation.
timelineNowDescription: I remain open to opportunities that not only contribute to my development but also allow me to generate value with the knowledge I have been building throughout my journey.
projectsDescription: Some of the projects I've developed or participated in
contactDescription: Have an interesting project or proposal? Let's talk!
contactMessage1: I am always open to new challenges and collaboration opportunities.
contactMessage2: If you have an interesting project or opportunity, don't hesitate to get in touch!
